title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Tony's dad Edward reveals sinister side as he commits shocking action
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

A new character arrives in Hollyoaks in the coming episodes, as Tony Hutchinson’s (Nick Pickard) dad Edward (Joe McGann) arrives in the village with the hopes of reconnecting with his family. He wastes little time in making an impression on several Chester residents, but it appears as if there’s more to him than meets his eye as he has a sinister side — which is set to come to light.

With Tony still missing, Diane (Alex Fletcher) is forced to arrange Harry’s (Parry Glasspool) funeral — and Marnie (Lysette Anthony) offers her support. Edward turns up on Diane’s doorstep without any notice, and makes it clear that he hopes to reconnect with his family. However, Diane’s not having any of it, and sense him packing as a result.

Edward’s not one for giving up, and thus he desperately tries to convince Diane that his intentions are genuine, and that he wants nothing more than an opportunity to build a relationship with his grandchildren. He makes several attempts to prove himself.

On Diane’s reluctance to let Edward in, actor Joe McGann said: ‘All she knows of him is that he abandoned Tony. The reception is a little short of openly hostile. Then she sees that he’s a man who has his charm, his sophistication, and he’s worldly about most subjects. He throws a little party for Diane and her friends, trying to win her around. I think he becomes successful when Diane sees the way other people react to Edward and she mellows towards him.’

However, while Edward proves successful in winning round some of Chester’s finest, Finn (Keith Rice) isn’t convinced by his efforts — and it seems his instincts are correct, as he later spies on him, and follows him to the florist — where he spots him do something incredibly shocking.

Joe said: ‘Edward overhears Cindy talk about her problem at the florist where her business is being held up by a rare bird. Edward decides to take matters in to his own hands in a quite shocking way. Cindy’s none the wiser but Finn catches him in the act. Finn is quite shocked by what he sees…’

It seems as if Edward is a lot more sinister than he appears on the surface.

The question is: what exactly is it that Finn catches him doing?

What’s more, will Finn relay his discovery to Diane?

Hollyoaks continues Friday 18th October at 7pm on E4.
